name: Mattermost
description: A quick connection to Mattermost using the Events API.

userName.description: This is the user name that your agent will use to post messages

userSelectionsPrefix.description: Prefix displayed for messages like quick responses or slash commands. "Username said: " is the default

incomingWebhookURL.description: URL provided by Mattermost when you created the Incoming Webhook

botAccessTokenOutgoingWebhook.displayName: Bot Access Token from Outgoing Webhook
botAccessTokenOutgoingWebhook.description: Token provided by Mattermost when you created your Outgoing Webhook

botAccessTokenSlashCommand.displayName: Bot Access Token from Slash Command
botAccessTokenSlashCommand.description: Token provided by Mattermost when you created your Outgoing Webhook

outgoingMessages.displayName: Sent responses as soon as they arrive (Multiple responses):
outgoingMessages.description: In case you are using multi action recognition you can enable this setting to send the messages as soon as they arrive instead of waiting for the response to be compiled.

waitTimeBetweenMessages.displayName: Time in MS between response messages:
waitTimeBetweenMessages.description: How much the channel should wait between agent responses?
